title: Multiply Linear Regression — my_lm
text: formula input formula y ~ x1 + x2 data input data mtcars

title: Multiply Linear Regression — my_lm
text: List containing following elements beta estimates(coefficients) fitted_values residuals mse rsquared adj_rsquared SE t p.value F_stat df1 df2
